com.wiris.quizzes.api

Interface QuestionRequest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface QuestionRequest
extends Serializable
    The request object for the Wiris Quizzes web service. It is created using a Quizzes object.
    See Also:
    Quizzes.newGradeRequest(com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance), Quizzes.newVariablesRequest(java.lang.String, com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance), Quizzes.newFeedbackRequest(java.lang.String, com.wiris.quizzes.api.QuestionInstance), Quizzes.newFeaturedSyntaxAssertionsRequest(com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question), Quizzes.newFeaturedAssertionsRequest(com.wiris.quizzes.api.Question)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMetaProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Add metadata to the request.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Whether there are processes in this request.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.wiris.quizzes.api.Serializable

        serialize

    • Method Detail

      • addMetaProperty

        void addMetaProperty(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String value)
        Add metadata to the request. Concretely it will add a property element in the meta section of the questionRequest message. It is useful for logging and tracking purposes. It won't have any effect on the response. See the predefined meta property names in QuizzesConstants.

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Whether there are processes in this request. This method is useful to prevent unnecessary calls to the Wiris Quizzes service. For example, this QuestionRequest could be a VariablesRequest with no variables at all, and hence without need to be executed.
        Returns:
        true if the list of processes is empty, false if there is at least one process to be executed.
